text: Ibyo yabategetse mu idini ni na byo yategetse Nuhu, ndetse n’ibyo twaguhishuriye (yewe Muhamadi), ni na byo twategetse Ibrahimu, Musa na Issa, tuvuga ko mugomba gutunganya idini mwirinda kunyuranya na ryo. Ababangikanyamana baremererwa n’ibyo mubahamagarira (byo kugaragira Imana imwe). Allah yihitiramo uwo ashaka, akanayobora inzira ye uwicuza
